content.rendered:
Depending on how the chips fall in the next couple of weeks we will have either 1 or 2 sessions open for the 2014 Brand New Conference and we would like to hear who you would be interested in seeing on stage. We have our opinion on who to ask for those last 2 spots but we wanted to make sure we weren’t missing anything obvious or that perhaps your ideas would validate what we have in mind.

We already have 12 sessions/speakers confirmed, and 2 of the remaining 4 sessions will follow a slightly different format, but just so you know that it is likely that some of the names you suggest are already included.

As a side note: Pre-sale tickets — the cheapest option to buy but missing a speaker line-up — will go on sale in early February.

excerpt.rendered: Depending on how the chips fall in the next couple of weeks we will have either 1 or 2 sessions open for the 2014 Brand New Conference and we would like to hear who you would be interested in seeing…
